title: Power supply produces voltage to find current

content.description: Four resistors, all with the same resistance R, are connected as shown above.
content.question: If the power supply produces 10 V and the resistance R is 5 ùõÄ, what is the current in resistor R4 ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
